description:
Ryo comes across a stuntwoman named Yuki who is trying to get her memory back by performing dangerous stunts. She believes Yuki is being hypnotised by someone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Combination of puzzlement & recovery! Memories are a distant light
Kiken o Kau Bijo! Omoide wa Hikari no Kanata ni
危険を買う美女! 想い出は光の彼方に
